text.text: It automatically creates and proposes FDNS and RDNS for provided IPs, adds sending domains to PMTA server and configures SMTPs according to set preferences.
Generates pair of both the keys for DKIM, automatically adds the Private Key to encrypt the outgoing mail header, and proposes the Public Key for the DNS panel.

Proposes appropriate values for CNAME DNS Entry, if CNAME is selected as Masking Type, offers the .htaccesss configuration file to be placed in the associated folder, if .htaccess is selected as Masking Type
